review: I just purchased the Fire Stick so had it for about a week. I like that I have access to Netflix. I also signed up for a free month of Prime, so I get access to free movies and tv shows that aren't available on Netflix. I live the little remote that came with it too. I would definitely recommend this product to friends.
author: velveteen Foxx
